function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate updating of the danger model leading to incorrect risk assessment for different scenarios.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and potential conflict in the city.","Mitigation":"Regular updating of the danger model based on context-specific parameters and routines. Consideration of educational, healthcare, and leisure amenities.","Technologies":"AI-based modeling and simulation tools for scenario-specific danger assessment.","People":"City residents, visitors, and workers in educational, healthcare, and leisure establishments.","Owner":"City authorities, service providers, and technology developers."}]}
